__e: She's over the whole jealousy thing, and now she's inside...
If it's just out of jealousy, and you don't want anything more for the two of us, then there's really nothing in that for me.
Then Scott found out about it and he told me tonight, he told me she was not right... she was sick inside... sick with jealousy... and that is why she killed him.
The question of whether jealousy is the fear of sharing or the fear of losing was of little interest to me.
Maybe a little jealousy's good for both of us.
To understand this world, understand that for him, jealousy is never even felt. - Monsters!
